items.title: Gut Microbiota Show Promise in the Fight Against Gout

items.title: Eosinophilic Esophagitis Demands Whole-Patient Care
items.description: EoE is increasingly diagnosed in Europe, yet for many patients, the biggest hurdle lies beyond treating the inflammation. Medscape News Europe

items.title: When Alcohol and COPD Collide, Lungs Suffer More
items.description: Experts urge primary care docs to question the alcohol use of patients with COPD. Medscape Medical News
